name: Paradise Sunrise
description: This recipe is a fresh tropical fruit juice that is both sweet and tart. It tastes great as a shake and vape but after about a week it really comes together as more of a singular flavor.
author: louiesquared

reviews.text: Delicious! Out of the gate, it's predominantly a sweet (but not overwhelmingly sweet) pineapple. Not sharp or acidic like some, very pleasant. Other flavor notes lurk in the background, again very pleasant, not "in your face." Love it as a SnV, anxious to see how much better it gets as it ages....thank you for this!
